title: Ladybugs
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 50 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 40L
description: Ladybugs explains the differences and similarities among different varieties of ladybugs. The vivid photographs and high-frequency words support early emergent readers. The book can also be used to teach comparing and contrasting as well as visualizing while reading.
meta: colors, insects, ladybugs, plants, spots, stripes
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /L/ sound
Declarative Sentences : Recognize and use declarative sentences
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word some

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
